Title: The Duke of Edinburgh Awards
Plot: Will is asked to co-ordinate the school's Duke of Edinburgh award scheme, and immediately turns the situation to his advantage, using it as an opportunity to volunteer at an old peoples home to try and snare his former babysitter. The other boys help out, except for Simon who has problems of his own.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language,sexual material and other content that may offend
